q: . Football fans cheer for hard hits all the time, and if the Bears were facing the Eagles, virtually every Bears fan would have joined Buehrle in hoping that Michael Vick got viciously hit. As James Harrison said, I don't want to injure anybody... I try to hurt people. In football, football fans root for players to get hurt. Football players try to inflict hurt. I'd find it easier to censure Buehrle if football's hypocrisy on pain weren't so transparent. Report

A statement from David Cameron read: I am very sorry that Andy Coulson has decided to resign as my director of communications, although I understand that the continuing pressures on him and his family mean that he feels compelled to do so. " Andy Coulson has told me that the focus on him was impeding his ability to do his job and was starting to prove a distraction for the government. Andy Coulson 's position had appeared tenuous for several months as the row over phone hacking at the News of the World intensified. Simon Cowell , whose music industry experience is mostly on the record label end, wants to replicate that experience on` The X Factor.' It's more interesting to me because I have a lot more to do with that. When you lose an artist, part of you has lost as well. You win when they win. While we've no idea who Simon Cowell has his eye on for the panel, he did emphasize the level of commitment the judges will need to make to not just the show, but the contestants.
